jobs_results.title: Senior Software Engineer (iOS)
jobs_results.description:
We are seeking a motivated Middle/Senior iOS Developer to join our international team. Take your chance to play a critical role in a stable long-term project and work with a world-known customer.

Work at Exadel - Who We AreSince 1998, Exadel has been engineering its products and custom software for clients of all sizes. Headquartered in Walnut Creek, California, Exadel has 2,000+ employees in development centers across America, Europe, and Asia. Our people drive Exadel’s success and are at the core of our values.

About Our CustomerThe American memorabilia manufacturer is primarily known for producing yearbooks and class rings for high schools and colleges. The company also produced photobook products for Disney’s PhotoPass photography service at theme parks and resorts. In addition to its headquarters near Minneapolis and operational offices in Owatonna, Minnesota, the customer has facilities throughout the United States.

Requirements• 5+ years of professional experience performing iOS software development
• Competency in Objective-C, Swift 5+, Core Bluetooth, XCTest Unit Testing
• Working knowledge of toolsets such as:

• Build Tools: Xcode, Firebase, AppStore Connect, Apple Developer Portal
• Source Control: Git via Bitbucket and/or GitLabs
• Work Request Systems: Jira, AWS DevOps
• Working experience with integrating Card readers for payment processing

• Proficiency in SDLC Methodologies: Agile, SCRUM, Kanban, Architectural patterns/frameworks, SOLID principles
• Availability to work with CST (Chicago) time zone overlap (till 7-8 pm to CET)
• Familiarity with JSON Web Token (JWT)
• JavaScript, HTML, and CSS background
• Practice in writing HLSL shaders and/or utilizing Shader Graph for shader design or experience using Amplify or another equivalent 3rd party shader creation tool
• Keep an eye on the performance of the assets and set standards for workflow through the production pipeline
• Ability to deliver production-ready files and source code integrated into the GitLab source control system
• Familiarity with the software development lifecycle

English level Upper-Intermediate+

Nice to have• Know how to use art packages ranging from modeling to texturing and special effects
• Be able to customize art packages
• Predict the needs of the artists to streamline their productivity
• Portfolio in 3d software – games or product rendering

Responsibilities• Plan, design, and implement applications for iOS
• Monitor the performance, quality, and responsiveness of the company's applications
• Work with the rest of the team to define, design, and develop new features
• Identify process bottlenecks
• Find and fix bugs on time
• Suggest improvements for the current processes

jobs_results.title: Junior iOS Developer
jobs_results.description: Orange este ceea ce suntem si ceea ce facem, în fiecare zi În lume sunt peste 123 de milioane de oameni pe care îi despart distanţe, care vorbesc limbi diferite şi au moduri de viaţã diferite. Dar toţi au ales acelaşi lucru: sã comunice aşa cum simt, sã priveascã cu deschidere şi optimism spre viitor. Pe toţi îi apropie Orange, indiferent dacã trãiesc în Marea Britanie, Franţa, Elveţia, Belgia, Austria, Spania, Olanda, România , Moldova, Polonia, Slovacia, Rusia, Statele Unite ale Americii, China, Coreea, Japonia, India, Vietnam, Botswana, Camerun, Republica Dominicană, Egipt, Nigeria, Guineea Ecuatorială, Guineea Conakri, Guineea Bisau, Coasta de Fildeş, Uganda, Kenia, Republica Central Africană, Madagascar, Mali, Insulele Mauritius, Caraibe, Noua Caledonie, Reunion, Senegal, Vanuatu, India, Vietnam, Iordania, Bahrein. Orange este brandul sub care France Telecom furnizeazã servicii de comunicaţii mobile, Internet şi televiziune. Grupul France Telecom este unul dintre liderii mondiali în servicii de telecomunicaţii, cu peste 183 de milioane de clienti pe cinci continente. Creativitatea, îndrãzneala, dinamismul, deschiderea, grijă pentru detalii, consecvenţa definesc Orange în tot ce face. Orange înseamnã cã vom schimba tiparele şi ne vom dezvolta în continuare pentru a-ţi oferi serviciile de calitate de care ai nevoie, inovaţie şi transparenţã. În ceea ce facem, la Orange România, vom contura în fiecare zi mai clar ce înseamnã acest univers şi care sunt beneficiile pe care le aduce. Te invitãm sã experimentezi Orange şi avem încredere cã împãrtãsim aceeaşi convingere: viitorul este într-adevãr senin.

jobs_results.title: iOS Native Mobile Developer (with Unity experience)
jobs_results.description:
Role overview

We’re looking for an enthusiastic Native Mobile Developer skilled in Swift, capable of building and enhancing exciting mobile apps. Experience of Unity3D development, helping to create and maintain various other projects across a range of mobile AR and desktop VR platforms would be beneficial.

You'll be used to working in a hands-on, fast-paced environment. You'll have experience in creating and maintaining a variety of mobile projects across various platforms. Experience in AR Foundation and VR development is a bonus.

As an iOS Native Mobile Developer, you will:

· Be responsible for development and delivering native iOS solutions in various projects.

· Be capable of assisting with Unity3D solutions in various projects, mostly in AR.

· Be accountable for the quality of produced work and accuracy of provided time estimations.

· Take active part in problem solving and issue investigation

· Provide technical feedback

· Communicate effectively with the different teams of the Company, understand and respond to development briefs

· Contribute to technology stack selection and development approach, deployment tasks, and regular R&D activities

As an IOS Native Mobile Developer, you will bring:

Requirements:

· Solid knowledge of iOS development.

· A good working knowledge of version control using Git.

· Experience working both as a solo developer and in a team environment.

· Willing to learn new skills and approaches to writing code via skills sharing and self-learning.

· Experience in using RESTful web services.

· Strong experience with Swift and SwiftUI.

· Experience architecting iOS apps in a variety of design patterns.

· A good working knowledge of CoreData.

· Experience with maintaining CI/CD configurations.

· Strong skills in debugging using Xcode.

· Experience of writing and maintaining unit tests.

Desired skills:

· Be capable of assisting with Unity3D solutions in various projects, mostly in AR.

· Experience of using the combine framework.

· Some robust experience in Unity 3D and C# software development.

· Experience creating VR or AR solutions.

· An understanding of networked Unity projects, with Unity networking.

· Experience with Blender or other 3D modelling applications to handle more straightforward amends or simple asset creation.

· Experience with ObjectiveC.

· Experience of SignalR or MSAL.

jobs_results.title: iOS DEVELOPER
jobs_results.description:
Company Description

P3 digital services is focused on developing intelligent solutions for international clients.

At P3 digital services you will have the opportunity to work with cutting-edge embedded technologies and to test your abilities while developing innovative applications. You will be part of the team who won the prize for the Best of Mobile Award.

P3 digital services is focused on developing intelligent mobile solutions for international clients. At P3 digital services you will have the opportunity to work with cutting-edge iOS technologies and to test your abilities while developing innovative mobile applications. You will be part of the team who won the prize for the Best of Mobile Award.

We are a young, fun team, and we like to have responsible colleagues who are able to complete their tasks in a flexible way and work as they desire. Also you will have the opportunity to travel in Germany, Belgrad or Beijing.

Job Description
• Creates applications using Objective C or Swift
• Works with project stakeholders to clarify requirements or user stories
• Works with architecture team to create technical designs
• Prepares reports, manuals and other documentation on the status, operation and maintenance of the application
• Communicates issues with team lead and other stakeholders in a timely manner to limit project timeline and cost impacts
• Assures quality delivery

In case you don’t have prior experience in working with mobile technologies, but you are eager to learn, you have the chance to sign up for our internship program (for more details you can contact us here).

Qualifications
• Bachelor’s or Master’s Degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or equivalent
• Good knowledge of Objective C or Swift
• Strong understanding of object-oriented principles (OOP) and design patterns/practices
• Good knowledge of database design and data structures
• Exposure of transport formats like JSON, XML
• A good experience communicating for web services (HTTP, REST, SOAP)
• Fundamental understanding of source code versioning (Git)
• Eager to research and learn new technologies and methodologies
• Ability to work independently and within a team
• Solution-oriented and proactive work attitude

Additional Information

We offer:
• Competitive salary and great opportunity for personal development
• Flexible working conditions
• An interesting, dynamic and challenging working environment in a highly motivated team
• Exciting projects with prestigious international customers
• Private medical insurance
• Diversified possibilities for sport activities

We would like our new colleague:
• To be open minded and a team player.
• To have the ability to organize and prioritize their work.
• To have a proactive attitude and to deeply care about the quality of their work

You will work in a dynamic workspace and you will be involved in challenging projects.

If you are a team player who likes friendly, non-corporate environments and is looking to make a true impact, let's meet and talk about it. Also take a look at our awesome projects: www.p3-ds.com .

jobs_results.title: iOS Developer
jobs_results.description:
If you are:
• An experienced software developer, with iOS development experience and familiarity with Objective-C and Cocoa Touch
• An IT professional with theoretical and practical knowledge about OOP, design patterns specific to iOS development
• Experienced integrating backends (REST, JSON, XML) and have a good understanding of the main iOS frameworks such as Foundation, UIKit, CoreData, etc.
• Experienced working with third party libraries and APIs
• Understanding of the full mobile development life cycle
• Passionate about new technologies and innovation
• Ambitious and self-driven
• Proactive and details oriented
• Fluent in English

Then, together with your new team, your responsibilities would be to:
• Participate in defining project architecture and planning
• Design and implement project tasks according to specifications and planning
• Collaborate with the team (PM, developers and QAs) to ensure that project deliverables meet the required quality standards
• Perform research on various technologies and suggest creative solutions
• Provide continuous feedback and offer support and knowledge sharing to other team members

And by joining NetRom you will have the chance to benefit from international standards working conditions:
• Attractive payment and compensations
• Excellent opportunities to learn new things and develop your professional career: trainings, sharing sessions, conferences, international certifications - Microsoft, Symfony, Java Oracle, ISTQB
• Professional environment and working conditions
• Various team oriented recreational activities

Join us today by sending your CV.

jobs_results.title: Mid-Level iOS Developer
jobs_results.description:
About Us

Founded by two experienced Romanian entrepreneurs with multiple exits Laurentiu Balasa and Marius Iordache BibleChat has a dedicated 35 person team based in Bucharest and Cluj. We have over 7 million downloads and $14 million in funding from worldclass investors such as Play Ventures True Ventures and leading Romanian VCs.

About You

You are a skilled iOS Developer with a strong foundation in SwiftUI and a desire to build impactful mobile experiences that support spiritual growth. You have experience working with various SDKs APIs and Apple subscription frameworks and youre comfortable using analytics and A/B testing to drive datainformed decisions. You thrive in collaborative environments are eager to contribute to a shared vision and are motivated by the opportunity to make a positive difference in the world.

Top 5 Objectives
• Develop Engaging Features: Design develop and implement new features for the BibleChat iOS app using SwiftUI focusing on user engagement and a seamless intuitive experience.
• Integrate Key SDKs: Seamlessly integrate various SDKs (Mixpanel AppsFlyer Firebase Facebook) to enhance app functionality improve user journeys and track key metrics.
• Manage Apple Subscriptions: Effectively manage Apple subscriptions and related frameworks to handle user access renewals and cancellations.
• Optimize User Retention: Leverage analytics and A/B testing to refine features improve user retention and enhance the overall app experience.
• Contribute to CI Practices: Actively participate in and contribute to the teams continuous integration (CI) practices to ensure smooth highquality releases.

Main Responsibilities
• Develop and implement new features for the BibleChat iOS app using SwiftUI.
• Integrate various SDKs to enhance app functionality and user experience.
• Work with JSON and REST APIs for efficient data handling.
• Manage Apple subscriptions and utilize analytics and A/B testing for datadriven improvements.
• Contribute to continuous integration (CI) practices.
• Collaborate with the team to align user needs with functional and seamless interfaces.
• Follow Apples iOS design guidelines to ensure a consistent and intuitive user experience.
• Provide insights and feedback to foster a collaborative and growthoriented environment.

Requirements
• 2 years of experience in iOS development (were open to a wide range of experience!).
• Strong proficiency in SwiftUI and understanding of objectoriented and MVVM design patterns.
• Experience integrating SDKs and working with JSON and REST APIs.
• Knowledge of Git/version control and CI practices.
• Experience with Apple subscriptions analytics and A/B testing.
• Familiarity with Apples iOS design principles.
• Passion for developing impactful mobile applications.

Opportunities and Benefits
• Make a Global Impact: Contribute to a product that is transforming how people engage with sacred scriptures worldwide.
• Work with Experienced Founders: Collaborate directly with successful entrepreneurs who have a proven track record of building impactful companies.
• Join a HighGrowth Startup: Be part of a dynamic and rapidly growing team at the forefront of the faithtech sector.
• Compensation and Benefits: We offer a comprehensive benefits package including a cool office environment free massage gym membership free daily lunch and healthcare benefits.
• Develop Your Potential: Thrive in an anticorporate environment where innovation and results are valued above all else.

If youre a skilled iOS Developer who is passionate about creating meaningful mobile experiences and wants to be part of a missiondriven company we invite you to join BibleChat. This is an opportunity to contribute your talents to a product that is positively impacting millions of lives around the world.

jobs_results.title: Mobile Software Developer
jobs_results.description:
About Bitdefender

Bitdefender is a
cybersecurity leader delivering best-in-class threat prevention, detection, and
response solutions worldwide. Guardian over millions of consumer,
enterprise, and government environments, Bitdefender is one of the industry’s
most trusted experts for eliminating threats, protecting privacy, digital
identity and data, and enabling cyber resilience. With deep investments in
research and development, Bitdefender Labs discovers hundreds of new threats
each minute and validates billions of threat queries daily. The
company has pioneered breakthrough innovations in antimalware, IoT
security, behavioral analytics, and artificial intelligence and its technology
is licensed by more than 180 of the world’s most recognized technology brands.
Founded in 2001, Bitdefender has customers in 170+ countries with offices
around the world. For more information, visit https://www.bitdefender.com
About The Job

Bitdefender is a leader in security solutions and one of the best-known IT security brands.
We’re at the forefront of security innovation, and we’re looking for talented individuals to
shape the future of our products, our company, and the industry as a whole.

Our mobile apps are evolving to leverage cross-platform development using Flutter
to enhance our agility and efficiency. At the same time, we continue to rely on the
strength of native iOS development to ensure we deliver robust, secure, and
high-quality experiences for our users on iOS platform.

We are looking for a passionate Mobile Software Developer with expertise
in iOS development to join our team and help us take on exciting challenges
in security and mobile innovation.

What We’re Looking For

We’re seeking a creative and technology-driven individual with a solid programming background.
You should be eager to learn, solve complex problems, and work in an Agile environment to deliver
high-quality, high-performance mobile apps.

Ideally, You Should Have:
• 2+ years of iOS development experience, with expertise in Swift and iOS development tools (Xcode IDE, Instruments, Simulators).
• Solid understanding of iOS frameworks, Swift Packages, and dependency management tools like CocoaPods.
• Experience working with RESTful APIs to connect apps to back-end services.
• A strong grasp of the full mobile development lifecycle and experience with the Apple distribution process.
• The ability to write unit and functional tests to ensure code quality and coverage.
• Good knowledge of multithreaded programming and algorithmic thinking.
• Familiarity with Agile methodologies and version control systems (e.g., Git).
• Strong communication skills and fluency in English.

Bonus Points For:
• Experience with Flutter or other cross-platform development frameworks.
• A Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or a related field.
• A portfolio of past projects (e.g., on GitHub, Bitbucket, or similar platforms).
• Knowledge of Android development or Kotlin.

What You’ll Do:
• Contribute to our mobile app evolution, supporting both the native iOS codebase and our transition to cross-platform development using Flutter.
• Collaborate with the team to develop and enhance existing iOS apps, ensuring high performance, security, and usability.
• Help design and build new features and applications to complement Bitdefender’s mobile ecosystem.
• Work with Product Owners, UX designers, QA engineers, and other developers in an Agile Scrum environment.
• Continuously evaluate and implement new tools, frameworks, and technologies to improve the efficiency and effectiveness of our development process.

What We Offer:
• A dynamic and exciting work environment in a leading cybersecurity company.
• Competitive benefits aligned with your performance and contribution.
• Opportunities for professional growth and involvement in cutting-edge projects.

jobs_results.title: iOS Developer
jobs_results.description:
Are you an iOS mobile innovator? We need you! We offer a progressive and exciting work environment using some of the latest technologies and modern software development practices along with attractive career opportunities, competitive compensation and a fun workplace. If you have a passion for new technology and innovation and have a background in mobile development, we would love to meet with you!

Requirements:
• Ability to design and implement iOS applications with Xcode
• Proficient in Objective-C
• Knowledge of REST APIs
• Attention to details
• Experience working collaboratively with designers

Extra credit:
• Experience with Phonegap, HTML5
• Adept at hacking open source software
• Worked with git, subversion

Compensation:

Competitive salary

Relocation package for 2 months

Employment documents support regardless of the citizenship status

Transition program for middle-seniors

Technical workshops, courses, books

Certifications upon request

Team events and interesting tech conferences

English classes

Health Care Insurance

Food catering at the office; lunch subvention

Recreational & gaming room, gym, football, biking club, tennis.

jobs_results.description: At Tazz by eMAG, we stand for passion, quality delivered and know-how. We are always looking for the ones truly passionate about their work. If you are amongst them, you can rest assured there is a place for you in eMAG Group.

jobs_results.title: Senior iOS Developer
